headline: Lululemon warns about 'cautious consumer' as inflation, tariff concerns take a toll
summary: Lululemon stock fell 15% in afternoon trading after CEO Calvin McDonald said consumers are beginning to spend less in response to increased fears about the US economy.

headline: Here's Why Nike's Unexpected Ace in the Hole Makes the Dividend Stock a Buy Now
summary: After surging to an all-time high of over $170 per share in 2021, Nike (NYSE: NKE) stock has given up all of its post-pandemic gains and is hovering around multiyear lows.  Younger brands like Hoka -- owned by Deckers Outdoor -- and On from On Holding have eroded Nike's pricing power and some of its competitive advantages.  There are a few reasons to be optimistic about Nike in the near term.

headline: Nike Stock Is Trading Near a 7-Year Low. Is Now the Time to Buy?
summary: With the stock trading around levels it hasn't been at in years, could Nike be a good contrarian buy right now?  As inflation has chipped away at consumer purchasing power, Nike has seen its sales come under pressure.
